title: Finance
description: A comprehensive financial management web application with real-time tracking, budget planning, and investment portfolio management. Built with Laravel and Vue.js for seamless user experience.

title: Orizon
description: Modern web development platform with advanced features including drag-and-drop builder, real-time collaboration, and integrated deployment pipeline. Perfect for teams building scalable applications.

title: Fundo
description: Creative web design project with stunning visuals, smooth animations, and intuitive user interface. Focused on delivering exceptional user experience through minimalist design principles.

title: Brawlhalla
description: Gaming application with immersive user experience, featuring real-time multiplayer, leaderboards, character customization, and in-game chat. Built with Unity and Firebase.

title: DSM.
description: Minimalist web design with clean aesthetics, focusing on typography, whitespace, and subtle interactions. A showcase of modern design system methodologies.

title: MetaSpark
description: Innovative web design with modern UI/UX principles, featuring 3D elements, parallax scrolling, and micro-interactions that engage users throughout their journey.

title: Summary
description: Data visualization and summary web application with interactive charts, custom reports, and export functionality. Designed for business analytics and data-driven decision making.

title: Task Manager
description: Productivity application for task management with features like project boards, time tracking, team collaboration, and automated reminders. Boost your productivity with smart organization.

title: Arrival
description: Modern web development project with cutting-edge technology including progressive web app features, offline functionality, and push notifications. Built for the future of web.
